channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Custom Cursors | WordPress Cursor Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Custom Cursors | WordPress Cursor Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-5911|2024-01-08T19:00:37.176Z -- unknown -- wp%20custom%20cursors%20%7C%20wordpress%20cursor%20plugin
item.description: The WP Custom Cursors | WordPress Cursor Plugin WordPress plugin through 3.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2023-2221|2023-06-19T10:52:42.024Z -- unknown -- wp%20custom%20cursors%20%7C%20wordpress%20cursor%20plugin
item.description: The WP Custom Cursors WordPress plugin before 3.2 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by users with a role as low as Admin.
